name: Canvas Express
description:
A minimalist, fast-paced boxing fighting game.

Rounds in Canvas Express are short and a demand balancing act between KO'ing your opponent, not getting KO'd and not KO'ing yourself, as moving and punching take as much a toll to your stamina as taking a punch flush.

Please visit https://covacha.duckdns.org/~ramiro/canvas-express/index.en.md for more information.
